feed.title: Layann Wardeh - Hackers in the Bazaar Blog
feed.subtitle: Weekly reflections on hacker culture, open source development, and the journey through CSE 40842

entry.title: Reading 01: Cambridge - The Fifties and Sixties
entry.summary: First reflection on Steven Levy's exploration of early hacker culture at MIT and the origins of the hacker ethic.
entry.content:
Reading 01: Cambridge - The Fifties and Sixties

Content will be updated when the reflection is published...

This reflection explores Steven Levy's account of the MIT Tech Model Railroad Club and the birth of hacker culture in the 1950s and 1960s.
